attributes.action: Give all public sector in line with inflation pay awards.
attributes.additional_details: Over the past 10 years public sector have seen some getting pay awards whilst others get nothing. This causes resentment. Everyone getting a fair award is in everyone's interest. This will take out the political interference in pay awards.
attributes.background: I would like the government to keep the differential between public sector works and to give them a fair pay rise each year in line with inflation. That way there is no need for long negotiations between the government and unions which just causes friction.

rejection.details: The Government is not directly responsible for the pay awards for all public sector workers, but we could accept a petition calling on them to enshrine pay rises in line with inflation for public sector workers the pay of which they are responsible for.
